mapper.select: SELECT q.id, q.type_id, q.group_id, q.text, q.parse, o.id as optionId, o.text as optionText, o.is_key FROM bs_question q LEFT JOIN bs_option o ON q.id = o.question_id where q.group_id = #{groupId}

SELECT q.id, q.type_id, q.group_id, q.text, q.parse, o.id as optionId, o.text as optionText, o.is_key FROM bs_question q LEFT JOIN bs_option o ON q.id = o.question_id LEFT JOIN bs_question_group qg ON qg.id = q.group_id where qg.type_id = #{groupTypeId}

SELECT q.id, q.text FROM bs_question q LEFT JOIN bs_question_group qg ON qg.id = q.group_id JOIN ( SELECT ROUND( RAND( ) * ( ( SELECT MAX( id ) FROM bs_question WHERE group_id IN ( SELECT id FROM bs_question_group WHERE type_id = 5 ) ) - ( SELECT MIN( id ) FROM bs_question WHERE group_id IN ( SELECT id FROM bs_question_group WHERE type_id = 5 ) ) ) + ( SELECT MIN( id ) FROM bs_question WHERE group_id IN ( SELECT id FROM bs_question_group WHERE type_id = 5 ) ) ) AS id ) AS t2 WHERE q.id >= t2.id AND qg.type_id = #{groupTypeId} LIMIT 1
SELECT q.id, q.type_id, q.group_id, q.text, q.parse, o.id as optionId, o.text as optionText, o.is_key FROM bs_question q LEFT JOIN bs_option o ON q.id = o.question_id where q.id = #{questionId}
